briefdescription.para: Associe un modele de turbulence a l'objet.

parameterdescription.para: le_modele) le modele de turbulence hydraulique a associer a l'objet

memberdef.argsstring: (Sortie &, int, const LIST(Nom)&, const Nom &) const
memberdef.name: imprimer_nusselt_mean_only

briefdescription.para: Prints mean Nusselt number and heat transfer statistics to a file for specified boundaries.

detaileddescription.para:
os
Output stream for messages
boundaries_
Flag to control boundary selection (0: all boundaries, 1: specified boundaries)
boundaries_list
List of boundary names to process when boundaries_=1
nom_fichier_
Output filename
Calculates and writes average values for multiple thermal parameters:
Characteristic distance
Nusselt number
Heat transfer coefficient
Near-wall temperatures
Wall temperatures

Results are written for all boundaries combined and then for each boundary separately. Only processes fixed walls (Dirichlet_paroi_fixe) and moving walls (Dirichlet_paroi_defilante). Output format: time [mean_values] [boundary1_values] [boundary2_values] ...

briefdescription.para: Writes header line for Nusselt number and heat transfer statistics file.

detaileddescription.para:
boundaries_
Flag to control boundary selection (0: all boundaries, 1: specified boundaries)
boundaries_list
List of boundary names to process
nom_fichier_
Output filename
Creates header line with column names for thermal statistics including:
Characteristic distance (m)
Local Nusselt number
Convective heat transfer coefficient (W/mÂ²/K)
Near-wall fluid temperature (K)
Boundary face temperature (K)
Equivalent wall temperature (K)
Format: "Time Mean(field1) Mean(field2) ... [boundary1(field1) boundary1(field2) ...]" Writes warning messages if specified boundaries are not valid wall types.

briefdescription.para: Ouverture/creation d'un fichier d'impression de Face, d_eq, Nu local, h.
Ouverture/creation d'un fichier d'impression de moyennes.
Reprise d'un Objet_U sur un flot d'entree Methode a surcharger.

parameterdescription.para: flot d'entree a utiliser pour la reprise

briefdescription.para: Sauvegarde d'un Objet_U sur un flot de sortie Methode a surcharger.

parameterdescription.para: flot de sortie a utiliser pour la sauvegarde

briefdescription.para: Give a boolean indicating if we need to use equivant distance by default we consider that we use the equivalent distance.
Lit les caracteristques de la loi de parois a partir d'un flot d'entree.

detaileddescription.para:
Format: type_de_loi_de_paroi Les valeurs possibles du type de loi de paroi sont:
"loi_standard_hydr"
"negligeable"
"loi_VanDriest"
"loi_standard_hydr_scalaire"

briefdescription.para: Classe Turbulence_paroi_scal_base Classe de base pour la hierarchie des classes representant les modeles.

detaileddescription.para: de calcul des grandeurs turbulentes aux voisinages des parois. La methode principale a implenter dans les classes filles est calculer_scal qui doit se charger de calculer et remplir le tableau equivalent_distance_ des distances equivalentes en paroi.
